title: Sam the Cooking Guy's Slow Cooker Pulled Pork
description: Sam shows you how easy it is to make a pork shoulder into tender and delicious pulled pork.

asset.author: Bedbathandbeyond
asset.hookText: Sam shows you how easy it is to make a pork shoulder into tender and delicious pulled pork.

transcripts: The weather outside has been horrendous. But once again we're here for you - check out this easy, slow cooker pulled pork. Put thinly sliced onions and chopped garlic in the bottom of a slow cooker pot - add chicken broth. Combine kosher salt, cumin, chipotle chili powder, garlic powder and brown sugar - mix and rub really well over the pork. Place the pork on top of the onions and turn on. When its done - gorgeous, easily shredded pork that can go in anything. Tacos, sandwiches, even for a delicious porky benedict. You go to work, and the slow cooker does the work. Thank you!
